originalText.text: Our dog has been going to Bae Tails for DayCare and has been walked by their dog walker Vivan for the past 2.5. We  absolutely love their DayCare and Staff, including the outdoor area. Vivan has always done such an amazing dog of taking care of and walking our dog for us. We would absolutely recommend Bae Tails for any dog walking or doggy daycare needs.

text.text: Our dog has been going to Bae Tails for DayCare and has been walked by their dog walker Vivan for the past 2.5. We  absolutely love their DayCare and Staff, including the outdoor area. Vivan has always done such an amazing dog of taking care of and walking our dog for us. We would absolutely recommend Bae Tails for any dog walking or doggy daycare needs.

originalText.text: We have been using Bae Tails since the summer and our dog Azuki loves the people and her friends there. However, they sometimes cancel my appointment last minute and doesn't tell me. One time, they only emailed me when I was already on my way there and I was turned away at the door. The employees there expected me to check my email all the time but I can't do that when I was walking. Today, they canceled my appointment without telling me and I only known because I ended up canceling it myself. The issue really comes down to if I needed Bae Tails to look after my dog, I can't count on them because they will cancel on me last minute with just 1 email. I have communicated that at least calling me would make things better, but the service didn't improve.

originalText.text: Our dog absolutely loves Baetails. We have been bringing him for a few months and it has been great for his socialization skills as well as tiring him out. The staff are great and sent photo and video updates everyday which brightens our days when we are stuck in the office :)

originalText.text:
Love love love!
Our Lole adores the day care!
They are true dog lovers as they take an excellent care of our puppy!
They address any issues right away and we are so appreciative to them for that.
They are in contact with us via texts and Instagram feeds throughout the day!
We really love the Bae Tails
❤️❤️❤️❤️
On their way to Bae Tails (Lole and Bowie)

originalText.text: We recently moved away from NYC so I wanted to take a moment and write a review of Bae Tails since we are no longer customers.  Bae Tails is a wonderful doggy day care with the most reasonable pricing nearby in the UES.  The people that work there love dogs and take great care of them.  Our dog Basil was obsessed with Bae Tails and when it became clear on walks that we were going there, she would start pulling and would run right up to the front door, excited to go in and play with her friends. The staff are good at communicating with you if your dog is sick or acting funny and will also send you cute pictures and videos of the dog having a great time. The 80th street location (NY Tails) is also a good boarding option. We and Basil will miss Bae Tails and just wanted to quickly thank them for being so good to her.
